description:
School of Philosophical Historical and International Studies at Monash University, Melbourne, Australia.
Papers published by ERAS are accepted from the following disciplines: History, Archaeology and Ancient History, Religion and Theology, Jewish Civilisation, Philosophy and International Studies. Submissions from other disciplines with significant historical content will also be considered (e. g. Politics, Literature, Economics, Anthropology).

ERAS is a fully refereed journal, with DEST status that provides an international forum for current or recently completed Masters and PhD students to publish original research, comment and reviews in any of the fields listed above. We hope you enjoy reading ERAS and we look forward to your comments and contributions.
